changes: Feature: Implemented four new visual themes: Brown Mountains, White Snowpeaks, Orange and Black Volcano, and City Roadway.
Enhancement: Refined the City Roadway theme's yellow stripes for better visual scale and placement.
Enhancement: Updated the Volcano theme with white hurdles and a royal blue sky for improved aesthetics.
Enhancement: Reworked the accelerator power-up animation to a more dynamic three-step stutter boost.
Enhancement: Added a yellow lava-like effect to the volcano theme's grass blades.
Enhancement: Updated milestone hurdle colors to white for Green Grass and Black and Orange Volcano themes for better contrast.
Bugfix: Fixed a regression where the 'Load Custom Data' button was not loading user-provided data.
Bugfix: Corrected the audio muting logic to ensure background music resumes correctly when unmuted during gameplay.
Bugfix: Corrected collision detection logic for all on-screen objects on slanted ground to ensure accuracy.
Enhancement: Adjusted the turbo boost animation to a 15-degree upward angle for a more dynamic 'blast-off' effect.
Enhancement: Added a 'power-up' sound effect for accelerator collisions to improve audio feedback.
Enhancement: Added a 'quack' sound effect for obstacle collisions to improve audio feedback.
Bugfix: Fixed a visual bug where a blue strip was visible below the grass line.
Bugfix: Fixed a visual bug where a blue strip was visible below the grass line.
